A data transfer object (DTO) representing a filter option item for device filtering operations, including the filter value, display label, and matching item count.

## Key Components

- **DeviceFilterItem**: Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern
- **value**: String field representing the actual filter value used in queries
- **label**: String field for user-friendly display text
- **count**: Integer field indicating how many devices match this filter option
- **Swagger annotations**: OpenAPI documentation for REST API integration

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a device filter item using builder pattern
DeviceFilterItem filterItem = DeviceFilterItem.builder()
    .value("online")
    .label("Online")
    .count(42)
    .build();

// Creating a list of filter items for a dropdown
List<DeviceFilterItem> statusFilters = Arrays.asList(
    new DeviceFilterItem("online", "Online", 42),
    new DeviceFilterItem("offline", "Offline", 15),
    new DeviceFilterItem("maintenance", "Under Maintenance", 3)
);

// Accessing properties
String filterValue = filterItem.getValue(); // "online"
String displayText = filterItem.getLabel(); // "Online"
Integer deviceCount = filterItem.getCount(); // 42
```
